blocks.name: tglowdim1
blocks.content: Lower dimension axiom for one dimension. In dimension at least 1, there are at least two distinct points. The condition "the space is of dimension 1 or more" is written here as ` 2 <_ ( # `` P ) ` to avoid a new definition, but a different convention could be chosen. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 23-Mar-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm tglowdim1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cds, c1))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(citv, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, c0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wne(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wceq(c2, cfv(cds, c1)))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wne(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wceq(c3, cfv(citv, c1)))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wne(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wi(w0, wcel(c1, cstrkg)))
  sylancr(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wcel(c0, universe), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, c0)))
  fvexi(c0, cbs, c1)
  hashge2el2dif(s0, s1, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: tgldimor

blocks.name: tgldim0eq
blocks.content: In dimension zero, any two points are equal. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Apr-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm tgldim0eq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(chash, c2), nat1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
} = {
  exlimddv(hs0, w0, wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, csn(cv(hs0))))
  sylib(w0, wex(hs0, wceq(c2, csn(cv(hs0)))), wceq(cfv(chash, c2), nat1))
  ax-mp(wb(wceq(cfv(chash, c2), nat1), wex(hs0, wceq(c2, csn(cv(hs0))))), wcel(c2, universe))
  fvexi(c2, c3, c4)
  hash1snb(hs0, c2, universe)
  eqtr4d(c0, c1, cv(hs0), wa(w0, wceq(c2, csn(cv(hs0)))))
  syl(wa(w0, wceq(c2, csn(cv(hs0)))), wceq(c0, cv(hs0)), wcel(c0, csn(cv(hs0))))
  eleqtrd(c0, csn(cv(hs0)), c2, wa(w0, wceq(c2, csn(cv(hs0)))))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c2, csn(cv(hs0))), wcel(c0, c2))
  elsni(c0, cv(hs0))
  syl(wa(w0, wceq(c2, csn(cv(hs0)))), wceq(c1, cv(hs0)), wcel(c1, csn(cv(hs0))))
  eleqtrd(c1, csn(cv(hs0)), c2, wa(w0, wceq(c2, csn(cv(hs0)))))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c2, csn(cv(hs0))), wcel(c1, c2))
  simpr(w0, wceq(c2, csn(cv(hs0))))
  elsni(c1, cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}
